segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and everything seems routine at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is methodically drying dishes by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, is that water coming out over the rim? Holy cow!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the counter and floor in a sheet—didn't expect that!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in it, completely unaware; that's shocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my eyes left, there's a kid on a stool—wow, it's tipping!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's snatching cookies from the jar; such bold mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's aiding him, hand outstretched—didn't see that teamwork coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a serene garden; contrasts the surprise inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinets frame the boy perfectly; an unexpected composition.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Angry thoughts bubble up about the risks they're taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But mostly, I'm stunned by how no one notices the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
